description: Retrieves information about a flow. For more information, see Deploy a flow in Amazon Bedrock in the Amazon Bedrock User Guide.

parameters.name: aliasIdentifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the alias for which to retrieve information.

parameters.name: flowIdentifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the flow that the alias belongs to.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the flow.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The time at which the flow was created.

nested_items.name: flowId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the flow that the alias belongs to.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the alias of the flow.

nested_items.name: routingConfiguration
nested_items.description: Contains information about the version that the alias is mapped to.

nested_items.name: flowVersion
nested_items.description: The version that the alias maps to.

nested_items.name: updatedAt
nested_items.description: The time at which the alias was last updated.
